message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your position, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $14,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14,250 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
